pull.title: Cleanups to port mapping module post UPnP drop
pull.body: Based on #31130, this does a couple cleanups to `src/mapport.*` to clarify the logic now that there is a single protocol option for port mapping.

verification.payload:

qt: remove UPnP settings

tree 4785fe4852d09ab86edb0bee0d9884eb235f96ab
parent 844770b05ebc34789dc46d70cd6398089539c915
author Antoine Poinsot <darosior@protonmail.com> 1729449622 +0200
committer Antoine Poinsot <darosior@protonmail.com> 1729787010 +0200

daemon: remove UPnP support

Keep the "-upnp" option as a hidden arg for one major version in order
to show a more user friendly error to people who had this option set in
their config file.

events.message:
daemon: remove UPnP support

Keep the "-upnp" option as a hidden arg for one major version in order
to show a more user friendly error to people who had this option set in
their config file.

mapport: remove dead code in DispatchMapPort

Since there is now only two options in the MapPortProtoFlag enum, the
four possible combinations of current and enabled are already covered in
the four `if` branches.

events.message:
mapport: remove dead code in DispatchMapPort

Since there is now only two options in the MapPortProtoFlag enum, the
four possible combinations of current and enabled are already covered in
the four `if` branches.

mapport: make 'enabled' and 'current' bool

Since there is only a single protocol now, clarify the code by changing
the protocol enum for a bool for both variables.

events.message:

### Code Coverage

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#31158](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31158) (build, ci: Fix linking `bitcoin-chainstate.exe` to `bitcoinkernel.dll` on Windows by hebasto)
* [#31073](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31073) (ci: Split out native fuzz jobs for macOS and windows by dergoegge)
* [#31042](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31042) (build: Rename `PACKAGE_*` variables to `CLIENT_*` by hebasto)
* [#30997](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30997) (build: Switch to Qt 6 by hebasto)
* [#30634](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30634) (ci: Use clang-19 from apt.llvm.org by maflcko)
* [#29641](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29641) (scripted-diff: Use LogInfo over LogPrintf [WIP, NOMERGE, DRAFT] by maflcko)
* [#28710](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28710) (Remove the legacy wallet and BDB dependency by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

events.body: i'll review this when #31130 is merged, i have some of my own ideas about portmap.cpp as well that i haven't fully worked out yet.
